entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add generic versions of attributes in ASP.NET Core #37767
  • NavLink should have a core set of classes and inactive ones rather than just tacking on "Active" ones. #37765
  • Blazor Server exception when using SignalR with AAD authentication #37762
  • Test TlsHandshakeRejectsTlsLessThan12 fails on Server 2022 because TLS 1.1 is disabled #37761
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Optional Certificates - With Host names instead of IP's #37753
  • [Analyzer] Ensure Minimal API Endpoint Returns On All Paths #37751
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Flaky Test: Timeout for RequestTests.ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN(listenOptionsName: "Loopback") #37750
  • Blazor Wasm Standalone Hot Reload .NET 6 RC2 Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 Kestrel #37749
  • Browserlink causes "TypeLoadException" for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.IHttpSendFileFeature' after RC2 #37747
  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration` warnings in new project in ASP.NET Core 6.0 RC2 #37744
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TestServer HttpClient isn't able to handle redirect to external url #37742
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.BadHttpRequestException #37740
  • High Number of LoopBack Connection #37738

Closed

  • Generate TS Type Definition Files For `blazor.*.js` #5508
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Increased Build Times in net6.0 RC2 over RC1 (`rc.1.21416.1`) #36944
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor Components - Declaring parameters as obsolete does not show up in Intelisense #8075
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Obsolete attribute is ignored for Blazor component parameters #32206
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is there any better solution for Blazor CSS isolation? #28443
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Access to CSS scope in RenderTreeBuilder (Blazor CSS isolation) #32614
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Test failure BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_Works_WithOutLocalDB on Win10 ARM #34554
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Add a way to configure the IHttpRequestIdentifierFeature to read a configurable header #5914
    Next sprint planning
  • `<InputCheckboxGroup>` component and `<InputCheckbox>` support for other values than `bool` #37730
  • Cannot perform a HEAD request with browser request mode NoCors #30599
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Determine device support list for wasm AOT #33080
    6.0-docs-infra
  • calling OnPostPrint, sometimes I got dates from model binding property, sometimes i got default dates (0001-01-01 , 00:00).1st, 3rd calls i got default dates, 2nd, 4th calls i got real dates #37539
  • Expose `ElementReference` through `EventArgs` or through `on<event>` delegate #37733
  • Support of built-in Input components to work outside `EditForm` #37729
  • Packaging a client-side Blazor project into a single JS file #37732
  • Blazor Initial Load #37737
  • Unable to load shared library 'urlmon.dll' on linux environment #37436
  • reakpoints in partial class #37741
  • Route Constraints #37727
  • Single file build time improvement: proxy-yarp #36982
  • SignalR Question: Multiple hubs working with single connection #37702
  • SignalR typescript client fails to add custom headers #37700

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to stable Roslyn versions (#37663) #37764
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
  • Unquarantine (most) HTTP3 tests #37756
    area-runtime
  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable retry for bind tests #37754
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37745
    area-infrastructure
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Clean up remaining `net461` references #37731
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update selenium driver versions #37766
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Fix Quarantined Tests Scheduled Runtime #37763
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix Selenium Versions #37746
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN #37752
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37672
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix test typos #37701
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Upgrade Selenium Versions #37726
    7.0-preview1
  • Remove retries from BlazorWasm template tests & don't fail on restore errors #37715
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Support setting ApiParameterRouetInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Continue using HashCodeCombiner in Razor.Language #37725
    area-mvc
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #37696
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
